page.title: 08EDGELEY SHOPPING PRECINCT
page.content: In{Edgeley}we have our own shopping precinct. In the Precinct there are 64 different kinds of shops selling a great variety of things for us to buy. Most of the shopping area is pedestrianised to make it safe and pleasant for the people who use it. During the summer the precinct blooms with pretty flowers in hanging baskets Specially built flower beds make the area a beautiful and enjoyable place to shop in. Lots of people visit the shopping area from miles around and it is especially busy on Fridays and Saturdays. It half-day closing on Wednesday. Because of the hooligans shop-keepers put bars over the windows and doors at night. We are lucky in Edgeley in having such a good shopping precinct because it means that people can shop near to home and need not travel to the town centre.
